quest.name: Unexpected Guests
journal: Prapti is concerned someone is encroaching on Vira territory.
objectives: Head to the Vira hunting grounds.

dialogue.name: PRAPTI
dialogue.text: Adventurer. I would asssk a favor of you.

dialogue.name: PRAPTI
dialogue.text: In recent days, strange men have been ssstealing prey from our hunting grounds. They appear to be Ala Mhigans, but they do not recognize usss as allies.

dialogue.name: PRAPTI
dialogue.text: They refuse to lisssten when we explain they are tressspassing. If they were to see another ssstrider in our company, they may not be so quick to fight and flee.

dialogue.name: PRAPTI
dialogue.text: They were lassst spotted to the east of here. Please, go and ssspeak with them, before anyone comes to harm.

dialogue.name: PRAPTI
dialogue.text: I've never ssseen Ala Mhigans react to us with sssuch hostility. I hope thisss can be resolved peacefully.

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: You are under attack!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Look out! We've got company!

dialogue.name: BOSS02816
dialogue.text: What in Rhalgr's name is that thing!?

dialogue.name: ANANTATANK02816
dialogue.text: Please, wait! If you would listen for jussst a moment─

dialogue.name: BOSS02816
dialogue.text: Ahhh! K-Keep that thing away from me!

dialogue.name: ANANTATANK02816
dialogue.text: I fear they won't listen to anything I have to sssay.

dialogue.name: ANANTATANK02816
dialogue.text: Would you go after him and explain his people are tressspassing? I must tend to my wounds.

dialogue.name: BOSS02816
dialogue.text: You! You were tryin' to help that...that thing, weren't you? What do you want?

dialogue.name: BOSS02816
dialogue.text: They only wanted us to leave their huntin' grounds? So they're not savage monsters lookin' to feast on our innards?

dialogue.name: BOSS02816
dialogue.text: I see... Erm, sorry about before. It's not every day you see somethin' like that where I come from.

dialogue.name: BOSS02816
dialogue.text: Me and my friends are from a small village in the Peaks, you see, and with the Garleans blockin' all ways in and out of the place, we'd never traveled far.

dialogue.name: BOSS02816
dialogue.text: Now that they're mostly gone, we thought we'd have a look about, maybe scavenge for a bit o' food.

dialogue.name: BOSS02816
dialogue.text: We didn't mean no harm, honest. If it's all the same to you, we'll leave and go look for food somewhere far, far away from here.

dialogue.name: PRAPTI
dialogue.text: My sssister tells me she was attacked. They are no doubt the sssame men from before. You mussst stop them, but please─do not hurt them.

dialogue.name: PRAPTI
dialogue.text: You are returned. Were they willing to lisssten?

dialogue.name: PRAPTI
dialogue.text: Men from the Peaks? Interesssting. We were concerned the M tribe may have coerced them into ssstealing from our land. My sssisters will be relieved to hear this.

dialogue.name: PRAPTI
dialogue.text: If these people are desssperate enough to venture here for food, perhapsss we can help them. A deal of some kind.

dialogue.name: PRAPTI
dialogue.text: A share of our food stores in exchange for materials for our gemcrafting. Yesss, that would be a fair trade.

dialogue.name: PRAPTI
dialogue.text: I will need to dissscuss this with my sssisters. The beginning of a fruitful partnership may be at hand.
